title: JSW MG Motor, Vision Mechatronics to repurpose used EV batteries for large-scale energy storage
description: JSW MG Motor India partners with Vision Mechatronics to repurpose used EV batteries for large-scale energy storage. The first project focuses on deploying a 36kW UPS system for an industrial facility in Pune. This initiative aims to provide cost-effective, sustainable energy storage solutions for small and medium enterprises.
